# description

**Instance Property**

The description for a media item.

## Declaration

```swift
attribute String description;
```

## Identifying Media Items

- **artworkImageURL**: The URL path to the artwork that accompanies the media item.
- **subtitle**: The subtitle for a the media item.
- **title**: The title of the media item.
- **type**: The type of media item.
- **url**: The URL path to the media item.

items.description: The URL path to the artwork that accompanies the media item.
